description: Number of 3-element intersecting families (with not necessary distinct sets) of an n-element set.
references: V. Jovovic, G. Kilibarda, On the number of Boolean functions in the Post classes F^{mu}_8, Diskretnaya Matematika, 11 (1999), no. 4, 127-138 (translated in Discrete Mathematics and Applications, 9, (1999), no. 6).
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (29,-343,2135,-7504,14756,-14832,5760).
author: _Vladeta Jovovic_, Goran Kilibarda, Feb 28 2000
